headline: Adobe Downgrades Spotlight AI Competition And Questions Around Growth Durability
summary: Multiple major investment banks have downgraded Adobe, pointing to concerns about slowing revenue growth. Analysts are flagging rising competition in AI tools as a risk to Adobe's core software offerings. The downgrades highlight worries about potential structural changes in the software industry affecting Adobe. Adobe, ticker NasdaqGS:ADBE, is coming under sharper scrutiny as investors reassess its position in a fast changing software sector. The stock closed at $246.68 and has seen a...
